Method Detail

downloadAttachment

public void downloadAttachment(long aAttachmentId,
                               java.lang.String aMimeType,
                               java.lang.String aFilename)
Allows for an attachment to be downloaded given the attachment id, mime type and target file.

Parameters:
aAttachmentId - The id of the attachment on the ActiveBPEL server
aMimeType - The mime type of the attachment
aFilename - The target filename
